front.title: COSE Header parameter for RFC 3161 Time-Stamp Tokens

abstract.t: RFC 3161 provides a method to time-stamp a message digest to prove that it was created before a given time. This document defines how signatures of CBOR Signing And Encrypted (COSE) message structures can be time-stamped using RFC 3161 along with the needed header parameter to carry the corresponding time-stamp.
